581.849V643.664L384.832 627.665V565.85L325.124 581.849ZM385.832 565.582V627.397L445.54 611.399V549.583L385.832 565.582ZM446.54 549.315V611.131L506.248 595.132V533.317L446.54 549.315ZM507.248 533.049V594.864L566.956 578.865V517.05L507.248 533.049ZM567.956 516.782V578.597L627.664 562.599V500.783L567.956 516.782ZM628.664 500.515V562.331L688.372 546.332V484.517L628.664 500.515ZM689.372 484.249V546.064L749.08 530.065V468.25L689.372 484.249ZM750.08 467.982V529.797L809.788 513.799V451.983L750.08 467.982ZM810.788 451.715V513.531L870.496 497.532V435.717L810.788 451.715ZM871.496 435.449V497.264L931.204 481.265V419.45L871.496 435.449ZM385.832 690.246V628.433L445.54 612.434V674.247L385.832 690.246ZM446.54 673.979V612.166L506.248 596.167V657.981L446.54 673.979ZM507.248 657.713V595.899L566.956 579.901V641.714L507.248 657.713ZM567.956 641.446V579.633L627.664 563.634V625.447L567.956 641.446ZM628.664 625.18V563.366L688.372 547.367V609.181L628.664 625.18ZM689.372 608.913V547.099L749.08 531.101V592.914L689.372 608.913ZM750.08 592.646V530.833L809.788 514.834V576.647L750.08 592.646ZM810.788 576.38V514.566L870.496 498.567V560.381L810.788 576.38ZM871.496 560.113V498.299L931.204 482.301V544.114L871.496 560.113ZM628.664 626.215V688.03L688.372 672.032V610.216L628.664 626.215ZM689.372 609.948V671.764L749.08 655.765V593.949L689.372 609.948ZM750.08 fill-opacity="0.1"></path></g><defs><radialGradient id="radial-dark" cx="0" cy="0" r="1" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse" gradientTransform="translate(468.373 287.536) rotate(90) scale(430.464 467.627)"><stop stop-color="#D9D9D9"></stop><stop offset="1" stop-opacity="0"></stop></radialGradient></defs></svg></span><div class="flex flex-row-reverse gap-12 box-border w-full pt-40 lg:pt-10"><div class="hidden xl:flex self-start sticky xl:flex-col max-w-[28rem] h-[calc(100vh-9.5rem)] top-[calc(9.5rem-var(--sidenav-move-up,0px))]" id="content-side-layout"><div class="z-10 hidden xl:flex pl-10 box-border w-[19rem] max-h-full" id="table-of-contents-layout"><div class="text-gray-600 text-sm leading-6 w-[16.5rem] overflow-y-auto space-y-2 pb-4 -mt-10 pt-10" id="table-of-contents-content" class="toc"><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="0"><a href="#what-is-vapor%3F" class="py-1 block font-medium hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 Switching Teams</a></li><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="1"><a style="padding-left:1rem" href="#collaborators" class="group flex items-start py-1 whitespace-pre-wrap text-gray-500 class="group flex items-start py-1 whitespace-pre-wrap text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">Creating An IAM Role</a></li><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="2"><a style="padding-left:2rem" href="#permissions" class="group flex items-start py-1 whitespace-pre-wrap text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">Permissions</a></li><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="2"><a style="padding-left:2rem" href="#defining-your-aws-budget" class="group flex items-start py-1 style="padding-left:2rem" href="#aws-service-limits" class="group flex items-start py-1 whitespace-pre-wrap text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">AWS Service Limits</a></li><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="0"><a href="#notification-methods" class="py-1 block font-medium hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">Notification Methods</a></li><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="1"><a style="padding-left:1rem" href="#slack" class="group flex items-start py-1 whitespace-pre-wrap text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">Legal and Compliance</a></li></ul></div></div></div><div class="relative grow box-border flex-col w-full mx-auto px-1 lg:pl-[23.7rem] lg:-ml-12 xl:w-[calc(100%-28rem)]" id="content-area"><header id="header" class="relative"><div class="mt-0.5 space-y-2.5"><div class="eyebrow h-5 text-primary dark:text-primary-light text-sm font-semibold">Get Started</div><div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center relative gap-2"><h1 id="page-title" class="inline-block text-2xl sm:text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 tracking-tight dark:text-gray-200">Introduction</h1></div></div><div class="mt-2 text-lg prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert"><p>Manage your Laravel infrastructure on Vapor and fall in love with the scalability and simplicity of serverless.</p></div></header><div class="flex flex-col gap-8"></div><div class="mdx-content relative mt-8 mb-14 prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert" data-page-title="Introduction" data-page-href="/introduction" id="content"><div class="card-group not-prose grid gap-x-4 sm:grid-cols-2"><a class="card block font-normal group relative my-2 ring-2 ring-transparent rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-background-dark border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 overflow-hidden w-full cursor-pointer hover:!border-primary dark:hover:!border-primary-light" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" href="https://vapor.laravel.com/register"><div class="px-6 py-5 relative" data-component-part="card-content-container"><div id="card-link-arrow-icon" class="absolute text-gray-400 dark:text-gray-500 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light top-5 right-5"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-arrow-up-right w-4 h-4"><path d="M7 7h10v10"></path><path d="M7 17 17 7"></path></svg></div><div class="h-6 w-6 fill-gray-800 dark:fill-gray-100 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100" data-component-part="card-icon"><svg class="h-6 w-6 bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light !m-0 shrink-0" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/user-plus.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/user-plus.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div><h2 class="not-prose font-semibold text-base text-gray-800 dark:text-white mt-4" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="card-title">Create An Account</h2><div class="prose mt-1 font-normal text-sm leading-6 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400" data-component-part="card-content"><span data-as="p">Create your Vapor account today</span></div></div></div></a><a class="card block font-normal group relative my-2 ring-2 ring-transparent rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-background-dark border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 overflow-hidden w-full cursor-pointer hover:!border-primary dark:hover:!border-primary-light" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" href="https://laracasts.com/series/serverless-laravel"><div class="px-6 py-5 relative" data-component-part="card-content-container"><div id="card-link-arrow-icon" class="absolute text-gray-400 dark:text-gray-500 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light top-5 right-5"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-arrow-up-right w-4 h-4"><path d="M7 7h10v10"></path><path d="M7 17 17 7"></path></svg></div><div class="h-6 w-6 fill-gray-800 dark:fill-gray-100 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100" data-component-part="card-icon"><svg class="h-6 w-6 bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light !m-0 shrink-0" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/circle-play.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/circle-play.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div><h2 class="not-prose font-semibold text-base text-gray-800 dark:text-white mt-4" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="card-title">Watch More</h2><div class="prose mt-1 font-normal text-sm leading-6 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400" data-component-part="card-content"><span data-as="p">Watch the free Vapor series on Laracasts</span></div></div></div></a></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="what-is-vapor%3F"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#what-is-vapor%3F" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">What Is Vapor?</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Laravel Vapor is an auto-scaling, serverless deployment platform for Laravel, powered by AWS Lambda. Manage your Laravel infrastructure on Vapor and fall in love with the scalability and simplicity of serverless.</span>
<span data-as="p">Vapor abstracts the complexity of managing Laravel applications on AWS Lambda, as well as interfacing those applications with SQS queues, databases, Redis clusters, networks, CloudFront CDN, and more. Some highlights of Vaporâ€™s features include:</span>
<ul>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Auto-scaling web / queue infrastructure fine tuned for Laravel</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Zero-downtime deployments and rollbacks</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Environment variable / secret management</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Database management, including point-in-time restores and scaling</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Redis Cache management, including cluster scaling</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Database and cache tunnels, allowing for easy local inspection</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Automatic uploading of assets to Cloudfront CDN during deployment</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Unique, Vapor assigned vanity URLs for each environment, allowing immediate inspection</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Custom application domains</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">DNS management</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Certificate management and renewal</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Application, database, and cache metrics</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">CI friendly</span>
</li>
</ul>
<span data-as="p"><strong>In short, you can think of Vapor as</strong> <a href="https://forge.laravel.com" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Laravel Forge</a> <strong>for serverless technology.</strong></span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="requirements"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#requirements" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Requirements</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Vapor requires that your application be compatible with PHP 7.3+ and Laravel 6.0+.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="account-creation"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#account-creation" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Account Creation</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Before integrating Vapor into your application, you should create a Vapor account. If you are just collaborating with others on their projects, you are not required to have a Vapor subscription. To create and manage your own projects, you will need a Vapor subscription.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="installing-the-vapor-cli"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#installing-the-vapor-cli" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Installing The Vapor CLI</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">You will deploy your Laravel Vapor applications using the <a href="https://github.com/laravel/vapor-cli" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Vapor CLI</a>. This CLI may be installed globally or on a per-project basis using Composer:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="3" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="3"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">composer</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> require</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> laravel/vapor-cli</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> --update-with-dependencies</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">composer</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> global</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> require</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> laravel/vapor-cli</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> --update-with-dependencies</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">When the CLI is installed per project, you will likely need to execute it via the <code>vendor/bin</code> directory of your project, which is where Composer installs executables. For example, to view all of the available Vapor CLI commands, you may use the <code>list</code> command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">php</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> vendor/bin/vapor</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> list</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10" data-callout-type="note"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-sky-500" aria-label="Note"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 1.3C10.14 1.3 12.7 3.86 12.7 7C12.7 10.14 10.14 12.7 7 12.7C5.48908 12.6974 4.0408 12.096 2.97241 11.0276C1.90403 9.9592 1.30264 8.51092 1.3 7C1.3 3.86 3.86 1.3 7 1.3ZM7 0C3.14 0 0 3.14 0 7C0 10.86 3.14 14 7 14C10.86 14 14 10.86 14 7C14 3.14 10.86 0 7 0ZM8 3H6V8H8V3ZM8 9H6V11H8V9Z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">To save keystrokes when interacting with per-project installations of the Vapor CLI, you may add a shell alias to your operating system that aliases the <code>vapor</code> command to <code>php vendor/bin/vapor</code>.</span></div></div>
<span data-as="p">To learn more about a command and its arguments, execute the <code>help</code> command with the name of the command you wish to explore:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> deploy</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="logging-in"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#logging-in" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Logging In</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">After you have installed the Vapor CLI, you should authenticate with your Vapor account using the <code>login</code> command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">vapor</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> login</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="installing-the-vapor-core"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#installing-the-vapor-core" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Installing The Vapor Core</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">The <code>laravel/vapor-core</code> <a href="https://github.com/laravel/vapor-core" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">package</a> must be installed as a dependency of every Laravel application that is deployed using Vapor. This package contains various Vapor runtime files and a service provider to allow your application to run on Vapor. You may install the Vapor Core into your project using Composer:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 3.88477L4.00095 3.96387L3.92184 4.20117L3.50095 5.46191L3.49997 5.46387H3.49899L2.99899 3.96387L1.49899 3.46387L2.99899 2.96387L3.07809 2.72754L3.4863 1.50098C3.49031 1.50045 3.49522 1.5 3.49997 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">composer</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> require</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> laravel/vapor-core</span><span style="color:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#569CD6"> --update-with-dependencies</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="sandbox-accounts"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#sandbox-accounts" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Sandbox Accounts</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">After creating a Vapor account, your account will be on our free â€œsandboxâ€ plan, which allows you to experience the power of Vapor without the upfront commitment of subscribing to a paid plan. A sandbox account allows you to provision services such as networks, databases, and caches. You may add a single project which, once deployed, will be accessible via an <a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/lambda-urls.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">AWS Lambda function URL</a>.</span>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-amber-500/20 bg-amber-50/50 dark:border-amber-500/30 dark:bg-amber-500/10" data-callout-type="warning"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg class="flex-none w-5 h-5 text-amber-400 dark:text-amber-300/80" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" aria-label="Warning"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M12 9v2m0 4h.01m-6.938 4h13.856c1.54 0 2.502-1.667 1.732-3L13.732 4c-.77-1.333-2.694-1.333-3.464 0L3.34 16c-.77 1.333.192 3 1.732 3z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-amber-900 dark:text-amber-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">Sandbox projects may not utilize API Gateway versions, load balancers, firewalls, or custom domains. To utilize these features, you will need to choose a subscription plan.</span></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="teams"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#teams" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Teams</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">When you create your Vapor account, a â€œPersonalâ€ team is automatically created for you. You can rename this team in your team settings. All projects, databases, caches, and other Vapor resources belong to a team. You are free to create as many teams as you wish via the Vapor UI or the <code>team</code> CLI command. There is no additional charge for creating teams, and they serve as a great way to organize your projects by client or topic.</span>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="current-team-%26-switching-teams"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#current-team-%26-switching-teams" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Current Team &amp; Switching Teams</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">When managing Vapor resources via the CLI, you will need to be aware of your currently active team. You may view your current team using the <code>team:current</code> command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="1" language="shellscript"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button " data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Copy the contents from the code block"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/copy-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/copy-button:text-white/60"><path d="M14.25 stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " id="ask-ai-code-block-button" aria-label="Ask AI"><svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-gray-500 dark:text-white/40 dark:group-hover/ask-ai-button:text-white/60"><path d="M3.51169 1.50098L3.92087 2.72754L3.99997 2.96387L5.49997 3.46387L4.23825 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 </code></pre></div></div></div>
<span data-as="p">To change your active team, you may use the <code>team:switch</code> command:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="shellscript"><code language="shellscript" numberOfLines="1"><span class="line"><span style="color:#953800;--shiki-dark:#DCDCAA">vapor</span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178"> team:switch</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="collaborators"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#collaborators" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Collaborators</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">You can invite more people to your team via the â€œTeam Settingsâ€ menu in the Vapor UI, or using the <code>team:add</code> CLI command. When you add a new collaborator to your team via the Vapor UI, you may select the permissions to assign to that person. For example, you can prevent a given team member from deleting databases or caches.</span>
<span data-as="p">You may remove collaborators from your team using the Vapor UI or <code>team:remove</code> CLI command.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="linking-with-aws"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#linking-with-aws" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Linking With AWS</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">In order to deploy projects or create other resources using Vapor, you will need to link an active AWS account on your teamâ€™s settings management page.</span>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="creating-an-iam-role"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#creating-an-iam-role" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Creating An IAM Role</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">To create a new IAM role, navigate to the IAM service on your AWS dashboard. Once you are in the IAM dashboard, you may select â€œRolesâ€ from the left-side navigation panel and click the â€œCreate Roleâ€ button.</span>
<span data-as="p">The process for creating the role is outlined in these steps:</span>
<ol>
<li>Choose â€œAWS accountâ€ as the trusted entity type, and select â€œAnother AWS accountâ€.</li>
<li>Enter the â€œVapor Account IDâ€ from the Vapor dashboard.</li>
<li>Under â€œOptionsâ€, enable the â€œRequire external IDâ€ checkbox, enter the â€œTeam External IDâ€ shown in the Vapor dashboard, and then click â€œNextâ€.</li>
<li>In the â€œPermissions policiesâ€ section, either grant full administrator access by selecting the <code>AdministratorAccess</code> policy or create a custom policy with the <a class="link" href="/introduction#permissions">specific permissions</a> required by Vapor. After selecting a policy, click â€œNextâ€.</li>
<li>In the â€œName, review, and createâ€ section, provide a name and description for the role.</li>
<li>Complete the process by creating the role.</li>
<li>Copy the role ARN displayed in the AWS dashboard and add it to your AWS credentials in Vapor.</li>
</ol>
<h4 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="permissions"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#permissions" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Permissions</span></h4>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10" data-callout-type="note"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-sky-500" aria-label="Note"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 1.3C10.14 1.3 12.7 3.86 12.7 7C12.7 10.14 10.14 12.7 7 12.7C5.48908 12.6974 4.0408 12.096 2.97241 11.0276C1.90403 9.9592 1.30264 8.51092 1.3 7C1.3 3.86 3.86 1.3 7 1.3ZM7 0C3.14 0 0 3.14 0 7C0 10.86 3.14 14 7 14C10.86 14 14 10.86 14 7C14 3.14 10.86 0 7 0ZM8 3H6V8H8V3ZM8 9H6V11H8V9Z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">Since Vapor manages many types of resources across more than a dozen AWS services, it may be convenient to create a role with the <code>AdministratorAccess</code> policy. If desired, you may create a separate AWS account to house this role and contain all of your Vapor resources.</span></div></div>
<span data-as="p">On the permissions management screen, you may grant full administrator access to the IAM role by selecting the â€œAdministratorAccessâ€ policy. Or, you would prefer to not provide administrator access to Vapor, you may instead create a custom permission policy with the specific permissions needed by Vapor.</span>
<span data-as="p">It is necessary to create two policies due to the policy size limit set by AWS. To do so, select â€œCreate policyâ€ from the â€œPermissions policiesâ€ panel. Choose the JSON option and provide the first permission definition below. Then, follow the same process to create another policy using the second definition listed below. Once the policies have been defined, you may attach them to your new IAM role:</span>
<div class="code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 dark:twoslash-dark bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent" numberOfLines="236" language="json"><div class="absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5"><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center bg-primary-dark">Copy</div></div><div class="z-10 relative"><button class="h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button " 1.5C3.50416 1.50002 3.50807 1.50054 3.51169 1.50098Z" stroke="currentColor"></path><path d="M9.5 2.75L11.412 7.587L16.25 9.5L11.412 11.413L9.5 16.25L7.587 11.413L2.75 9.5L7.587 7.587L9.5 2.75Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></button><div aria-hidden="true" class="absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark">Ask AI</div></div></div><div class="w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out code-block-background [&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" <span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">    &quot;Statement&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: [</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">        {</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Sid&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: </span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;VaporPolicy&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Effect&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: </span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;Allow&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Action&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: [</span></span>

<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;apigateway:DELETE&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;apigateway:GET&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;apigateway:PATCH&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;apigateway:POST&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>

<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;apigateway:SetWebACL&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;budgets:ModifyBudget&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;budgets:ViewBudget&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudformation:CreateStack&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudformation:DeleteStack&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudformation:DescribeStacks&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudformation:UpdateStack&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudfront:CreateOriginAccessControl&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudfront:CreateDistribution&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudfront:DeleteDistribution&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudfront:GetDistribution&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudfront:GetDistributionConfig&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudfront:UpdateDistribution&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudwatch:DeleteAlarms&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudwatch:GetMetricStatistics&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;cloudwatch:PutMetricAlarm&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;dynamodb:CreateTable&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;dynamodb:DescribeTable&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;dynamodb:DescribeTimeToLive&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;dynamodb:TagResource&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;dynamodb:UpdateTimeToLive&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ec2:AllocateAddress&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ec2:AssociateAddress&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ec2:AssociateRouteTable&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
