[&amp;_*]:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:outline-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:ring-0 [&amp;_*]:focus:outline-0 [&amp;_pre&gt;code]:pr-[3rem] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&amp;_pre&gt;code&gt;span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25" data-component-part="code-block-root" tabindex="0" style="font-variant-ligatures:none;height:auto;background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E"><div class="font-mono whitespace-pre leading-6"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="background-color:#ffffff;--shiki-dark-bg:#0B0C0E;color:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4" language="json"><code language="json" numberOfLines="28"><span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">{</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">    &quot;Version&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: </span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;2012-10-17&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">    &quot;Statement&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: [</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">        {</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Sid&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: </span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;VaporPolicy&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Effect&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: </span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;Allow&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Action&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: [</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;sqs:CreateQueue&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;sqs:DeleteQueue&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;sqs:GetQueueAttributes&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;sqs:GetQueueUrl&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;sqs:SetQueueAttributes&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ssm:DeleteParameter&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ssm:DeleteParameters&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ssm:PutParameter&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;ssm:UpdateServiceSetting&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:AssociateWebACL&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:CreateWebACL&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:DeleteWebACL&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:GetWebACL&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:ListResourcesForWebACL&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:TagResource&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">,</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">                &quot;wafv2:UpdateWebACL&quot;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">            ],</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#116329;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE">            &quot;Resource&quot;</span><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">: </span><span style="color:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">&quot;*&quot;</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">        }</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">    ]</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#D4D4D4">}</span></span>
</code></pre></div></div></div>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-amber-500/20 bg-amber-50/50 dark:border-amber-500/30 dark:bg-amber-500/10" data-callout-type="warning"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg class="flex-none w-5 h-5 text-amber-400 dark:text-amber-300/80" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" aria-label="Warning"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M12 9v2m0 4h.01m-6.938 4h13.856c1.54 0 2.502-1.667 1.732-3L13.732 4c-.77-1.333-2.694-1.333-3.464 0L3.34 16c-.77 1.333.192 3 1.732 3z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-amber-900 dark:text-amber-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">Itâ€™s probable this list of permissions will change as we add new features to Vapor, which may result in unexpected errors if your policy is not kept up to date.</span></div></div>
<h4 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="defining-your-aws-budget"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#defining-your-aws-budget" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Defining Your AWS Budget</span></h4>
<span data-as="p">When linking your AWS account to Vapor, it is important to stay informed about your AWS costs. This can be done directly in the AWS Console using the AWS Budgets service. In addition, you can use Vaporâ€™s managed budgets to define your monthly AWS budget in USD, while also configuring multiple alarms directly on the â€œTeam Settings &gt; AWS Accountsâ€ screen of the Vapor UI. At this time, up to five alarms can be configured:</span>
<ul>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Actual cost &gt; 85%</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Actual cost &gt; 100%</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Actual cost &gt; 200%</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Actual cost &gt; 500%</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Forecasted cost &gt; 100%</span>
</li>
</ul>
<span data-as="p">Each alarm can be triggered once per monthly billing period. When an alarm is triggered, the team owner will receive an email, allowing them to act quickly and avoid unexpected charges.</span>
<h4 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="aws-service-limits"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#aws-service-limits" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">AWS Service Limits</span></h4>
<span data-as="p">AWS Service Limits can be increased through the following options:</span>
<div class="accordion-group [&amp;&gt;details]:border-0 [&amp;&gt;details]:rounded-none [&amp;&gt;details&gt;summary]:rounded-none [&amp;&gt;details]:mb-0 overflow-hidden mt-0 mb-3 rounded-xl prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert divide-y divide-inherit border dark:border-gray-800/50"><details class="accordion border-standard rounded-2xl mb-3 overflow-hidden bg-background-light dark:bg-codeblock cursor-default"><summary class="relative not-prose flex flex-row items-center content-center w-full cursor-pointer list-none [&amp;::-webkit-details-marker]:hidden py-4 px-5 space-x-2 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-t-xl" aria-controls="from-the-aws-console accordion children" aria-expanded="false" data-component-part="accordion-button"><div id="from-the-aws-console" class="absolute -top-[8rem]"></div><div class="mr-0.5" data-component-part="accordion-caret-right"><svg class="h-3 w-3 transition bg-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-400 duration-75" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/solid/caret-right.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/solid/caret-right.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div class="leading-tight text-left" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="accordion-title-container"><p class="m-0 font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-200" data-component-part="accordion-title">From the AWS console</p></div></summary><div id="from-the-aws-console accordion children" role="region" aria-labelledby="from-the-aws-console" class="mt-2 mb-4 mx-6 prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert overflow-x-auto cursor-default" data-component-part="accordion-content"><ol>
<li>Open the Service Quotas console.</li>
<li>In the navigation pane, choose AWS services.</li>
<li>Select a service.</li>
<li>Select a quota.</li>
<li>Follow the directions to request a quota increase.</li>
</ol></div></details><details class="accordion border-standard rounded-2xl mb-3 overflow-hidden bg-background-light dark:bg-codeblock cursor-default"><summary class="relative not-prose flex flex-row items-center content-center w-full cursor-pointer list-none [&amp;::-webkit-details-marker]:hidden py-4 px-5 space-x-2 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-t-xl" aria-controls="from-the-aws-cli accordion children" aria-expanded="false" data-component-part="accordion-button"><div id="from-the-aws-cli" class="absolute -top-[8rem]"></div><div class="mr-0.5" data-component-part="accordion-caret-right"><svg class="h-3 w-3 transition bg-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-400 duration-75" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/solid/caret-right.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/solid/caret-right.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div class="leading-tight text-left" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="accordion-title-container"><p class="m-0 font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-200" data-component-part="accordion-title">From the AWS CLI</p></div></summary><div id="from-the-aws-cli accordion children" role="region" aria-labelledby="from-the-aws-cli" class="mt-2 mb-4 mx-6 prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert overflow-x-auto cursor-default" data-component-part="accordion-content"><ol>
<li>Use the <a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/service-quotas/request-service-quota-increase.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">request-service-quota-increase</a> AWS CLI command.</li>
</ol></div></details><details class="accordion border-standard rounded-2xl mb-3 overflow-hidden bg-background-light dark:bg-codeblock cursor-default"><summary class="relative not-prose flex flex-row items-center content-center w-full cursor-pointer list-none [&amp;::-webkit-details-marker]:hidden py-4 px-5 space-x-2 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-t-xl" aria-controls="from-a-support-case accordion children" aria-expanded="false" data-component-part="accordion-button"><div id="from-a-support-case" class="absolute -top-[8rem]"></div><div class="mr-0.5" data-component-part="accordion-caret-right"><svg class="h-3 w-3 transition bg-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-400 duration-75" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/solid/caret-right.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/solid/caret-right.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div class="leading-tight text-left" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="accordion-title-container"><p class="m-0 font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-200" data-component-part="accordion-title">From a support case</p></div></summary><div id="from-a-support-case accordion children" role="region" aria-labelledby="from-a-support-case" class="mt-2 mb-4 mx-6 prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert overflow-x-auto cursor-default" data-component-part="accordion-content"><ul>
<li>If a service is not yet available in Service Quotas, use the AWS Support Center Console to create a <a href="https://support.console.aws.amazon.com/support/home#/case/create?issueType=service-limit-increase" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">service quota increase case</a>.</li>
<li>If the service is available in Service Quotas, AWS recommends that you use the <a href="https://console.aws.amazon.com/servicequotas/home" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Service Quotas console</a> instead of creating a support case.</li>
</ul></div></details></div>
<div class="callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10" data-callout-type="note"><div class="mt-0.5 w-4" data-component-part="callout-icon"><svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-4 h-4 text-sky-500" aria-label="Note"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 1.3C10.14 1.3 12.7 3.86 12.7 7C12.7 10.14 10.14 12.7 7 12.7C5.48908 12.6974 4.0408 12.096 2.97241 11.0276C1.90403 9.9592 1.30264 8.51092 1.3 7C1.3 3.86 3.86 1.3 7 1.3ZM7 0C3.14 0 0 3.14 0 7C0 10.86 3.14 14 7 14C10.86 14 14 10.86 14 7C14 3.14 10.86 0 7 0ZM8 3H6V8H8V3ZM8 9H6V11H8V9Z"></path></svg></div><div class="text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200" data-component-part="callout-content"><span data-as="p">For additional information, refer to the following AWS documentation:</span><ul>
<li><a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/servicequotas/latest/userguide/request-quota-increase.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Requesting a quota increase</a> in the <em>Service Quotas User Guide</em>.</li>
<li><a href="https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws_service_limits.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">AWS Service Quotas reference</a>.</li>
</ul></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="notification-methods"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#notification-methods" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Notification Methods</span></h2>
<h3 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="slack"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#slack" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Slack</span></h3>
<span data-as="p">In order to receive notifications via Slack, you will need to <a href="https://api.slack.com/apps" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">create a Slack App</a> and select the workspace to which the Slack App should be installed.</span>
<span data-as="p">Once the Slack App has been created, visit the <strong>Incoming Webhooks</strong> settings pane of your App under the â€œFeaturesâ€ sidebar. Then, activate the Incoming Webhooks feature using the activation switch.</span>
<span data-as="p">Once activated, you can create a new Incoming Webhook using the <strong>Add New Webhook to Workspace</strong> button. Finally, you should copy the Webhook URL provided by Slack and insert into your teamâ€™s <a href="https://vapor.laravel.com/app/team/settings/notification-methods" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Notifications Settings</a>. </span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="legal-and-compliance"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#legal-and-compliance" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Legal and Compliance</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">OurÂ <a href="https://vapor.laravel.com/terms" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Terms of Service</a> and <a href="https://vapor.laravel.com/privacy" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Privacy Policy</a> provide details on the terms, conditions, and privacy practices for using Laravel Vapor.</span></div><div class="feedback-toolbar pb-16 w-full flex flex-col gap-y-8"><div class="flex flex-col gap-4 xl:flex-col xl:gap-6 min-[1400px]:flex-row min-[1400px]:items-center md:flex-row md:justify-end"><div class="w-full flex flex-col gap-y-6"><div class="flex flex-row gap-5 items-center grow justify-between md:justify-start xl:justify-between min-[1400px]:justify-start"><p class="text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400">Was this page
